metadata.title: CVE-2021-47237 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: net:hamradio: fix memory leak in mkiss_close My local syzbot instance hitmemory leak in mkiss_open()[1]. The problem was in missing free_netdev() inmkiss_close(). In mkiss_open() netdevice is allocated and then registered,but in mkiss_close() netdevice was only unregistered, but not freed.
